remarks: Ordering in a structure power.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2015.)
statement:
pwsle.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwsle.v $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
pwsle.o $e |- O = ( le ` R ) $.
pwsle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` Y ) $.
pwsleval.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
pwsleval.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
pwsleval.a $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
pwsleval.b $e |- ( ph -> G e. B ) $.
pwsleval $p |- ( ph -> ( F .<_ G <-> A. x e. I ( F ` x ) O ( G ` x ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d I x $.
$d O x $.
$d R x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d ph x $.
